name: TwinsTalk
_source: s;Twins;For once, we're in agreement.{w} Don't give him the time of day.
s;Twins;What has he done for you?!|I mean, really.|Gave you a roof for you and your men.|But other than that?|Just sent you on errand after errand.
s;Simon;I suppose that is true, but he did help us in our time of need.
s;Twins;We think he's dismissive of you and loathful of the New Dawn.|But now that they're gone, he doesn't need you.
s;Simon;I see your point. Thank you for your advice.
s;Twins;It was mostly my idea.|That is not true!
